website_summaries.verdict: This is a great option if you're looking for a powerful solar fountain that fits well in larger spaces.
pros: Powerful motor that can shoot water up to 40 inches
Kit includes 4 nozzles for different spray patterns
Flower design that fits perfectly in a garden
cons: Will not work unless in direct sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money!
customer_reviews.text: Deserves less than 1. Will only work in BRIGHT sunshine. Floats as it will not suction to bottom of birdbath. Sprays water out of birdbath-since it doesn’t stay centered. Too much trouble to return.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis L. Jaggers

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this but it did not work. I left it in the water for a long time and at one point it did spurt water, for about 3 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Thoughts by HH

customer_reviews.title: Works really well BUT.........
customer_reviews.text: It works really good but has to be in "Direct Light" all the time if you want it to work. Not just in the sun.......but very direct light. No battery storage. But you will LOVE this product if you have those conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Packer

customer_reviews.title: Frustration
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these solar fountains. The stem comes off and now they are somewhere in the pond. The entire attachment that is seen in the picture is gone on both pumps. I cannot locate the company on line to ask for replacements. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed  :(
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 1 month. There is nothing serviceable, everything is sealed. It also empties the bird with most of the attachments. It will go to one side and with a little wind it shoots out the water.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Spout
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Recommended this to other friends who since purchased
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Duden

customer_reviews.title: Does not last even halfway through the summer.
customer_reviews.text: Update that I had been meaning to post months ago. This didn’t even last a season. It’s a great idea if you don’t want to convert your birdbath to an electric water pump. However, the technology for these solar water fountains isn’t there yet. This was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Caddy

customer_reviews.title: The Only thing.....
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I Don’t like is that it doesn’t charge or hold a charge once the sun goes down. Stops working if it’s cloudy. Needs direct sun or it’s nothing
customer_reviews.author: ShaKev815

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: The foundation stopped working with a week of putting on the pond.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my backyard ceramic bird bath. Looks very good and works just like advertised. All I need now are some cute little birds that want a bath
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works very poorly and will not stick to the bottom of the bird bath even with suction cups supplied I feel poor quality piece
customer_reviews.text: The fact that I could get a water fountain for the birdbath.
customer_reviews.author: Danny D Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I liked the 2 that I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I liked the 2 that I purchased, while they were working. They just do a little spurt now. I took them out of the birdbaths, rinsed them and then one would work for a short time. If I go out and do that several times a day one of them works a little. Too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun to watch! Birds love it and so do squirrels!
customer_reviews.author: 80Annie2012

customer_reviews.title: This was a disappointment but not worth sending back
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my LARGE bird bath in the front yard. It get direct sun light for at least 7 hours. This thing doesn't work if there is ANY small, minute portion of the base shaded. Including the tips that spray the water. When it does work which is about 1/2 hour per day (with us continuing to fill up the water that it splashes out & changing the placement. This was a disappointment but not worth sending back. I would never recommend this item,.
customer_reviews.author: mer

customer_reviews.title: solar fail
customer_reviews.text: I guess it is what the money paid for, and you get what you pay for. Unfulfilling product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy feeding and watching the birds in my garden. This item is a lovely addition.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Elaine Mattli

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive solar fountain keeps the water moving in my birdbath
customer_reviews.text: Came with several different fountain nozzles but most of them shoot so high the water blows out of the birdbath pretty quickly. Still, it works great on the shortest nozzle and both pollinators and birds seem to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E.

customer_reviews.title: Fountain!
customer_reviews.text: It was really nice but quit working after only having a short time!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Colley

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This solar fountain is by far the best one I’ve ever had. I love it! Works like a charm. The packaging was impeccable and the instructions clear and complete.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Greeley

customer_reviews.title: Opening the package was easy. What I did not like is everything else
customer_reviews.text: Opening the package was easy. What I did not like is everything else. Doesn't work in a shallow bird bath. Wont work elevated in a deeper one. Must be steady in order for it to pump properly. I attempted to anchor with a small container in which the suction cups held onto. Had a hard time keeping it level as they said in order for it to pump properly. Got it working once and the water did not spray up high. I tried all of the attachments. One other thing it doesn't charge, it only works if the sun is on it. I am going to try and return it, hopefully I can for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with all of the parts. Missing parts B and G. Unusuable without these parts. No phone number to call. Will see if they see this and remedy the problem. No Amaxon box/packaging to return it in.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Even in direct sunlight, the fountain sputters. When ...
customer_reviews.text: Even in direct sunlight, the fountain sputters. When water sits on the solar panels, it seems to effect the fountains solar panels.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Eckenrode
